summary: When Eva opens her eyes the young girl finds herself chained terrified for being abused. Her fears become reality in a way no one could ever imagine.
cast: Carolien Spoor|Dragan Bakema|Thijs Römer|Rogier Philipoom|Juliette van Ardenne|Nienke Römer|Jappe Claes|Peter Faber|Frits Lambrechts|Dennis Overeem|Harry van Rijthoven|Alison Carroll|Donja de Wit|Ernst Dekkers
title: Claustrofobia
